mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_main_people tmp where 1 = 1

select tmp.people_sn , tmp.lang_code , tmp.people_nm , tmp.people_dept , tmp.cn_pc , tmp.cn_mo , tmp.link_url , tmp.atch_id as imageAtchId , ( select physicl_flpth from tb_atch where atch_id = tmp.atch_id ) image_flpth , tmp.sort_ordr , tmp.regist_dt , tmp.register_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tmp.register_sn ) register_nm , tmp.updt_dt , tmp.updusr_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tmp.updusr_sn ) updusr_nm from tb_main_people tmp where 1 = 1
order by tmp.people_sn asc

select tmp.people_sn , tmp.lang_code , tmp.people_nm , tmp.people_dept , tmp.cn_pc , tmp.cn_mo , tmp.link_url , tmp.atch_id as imageAtchId , ( select physicl_flpth from tb_atch where atch_id = tmp.atch_id ) image_flpth , tmp.sort_ordr , tmp.regist_dt , tmp.register_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tmp.register_sn ) register_nm , tmp.updt_dt , tmp.updusr_sn , ( select user_nm from tb_user where user_sn = tmp.updusr_sn ) updusr_nm from tb_main_people tmp where tmp.people_sn = #{peopleSn}
